reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 377/07: POLITICAL ACTIVITY: SPECIALLY RESTRICTED PUBLIC SERVANTS
reg_info.reg_name_text: Political Activity: specially restricted public servants
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 377/07: POLITICAL ACTIVITY: SPECIALLY RESTRICTED PUBLIC SERVANTS

content.content: 1. The tribunals listed in Schedule 1 are prescribed for the purposes of paragraph 9 of subsection 85 (2) of the Act.  O. Reg. 377/07, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The tribunals listed in Schedule 1 are prescribed for the purposes of paragraph 9 of subsection 85 (2) of the Act.  O. Reg. 377/07, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The following classes of public servants are prescribed for the purposes of paragraph 10 of subsection 85 (2) of the Act: 1. The government appointees to the Niagara Escarpment Commission who are not members of the council of a municipality. 2. The Independent Police Review Director and the government appointees in his or her office.  O. Reg. 377/07, s. 2; O. Reg. 310/11, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
2. The following classes of public servants are prescribed for the purposes of paragraph 10 of subsection 85 (2) of the Act:

1. The government appointees to the Niagara Escarpment Commission who are not members of the council of a municipality.

2. The Independent Police Review Director and the government appointees in his or her office.  O. Reg. 377/07, s. 2; O. Reg. 310/11, s. 1.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 377/07, s. 3. schedule 1   prescribed tribunals 1.
